Writer: Mike Myers, Michael McCullers, Mike Myers (characters)
Title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
Actors: Mike Myers, Heather Graham, Michael York, Robert Wagner
Plot: Dr. Evil is back and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 1960s and steal Austin Powers' mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 18 wins & 29 nominations.
